recordLookups.name: GetAccountrecord
recordLookups.label: GetAccountrecord
recordLookups.filterLogic: ((1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4) AND 5 AND (6 OR 8) AND (7 OR 9))

fields.name: LeadError_0
fields.fieldText: This Lead Number {!Lead_Number} Is Already Converted.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_leadDataText
fields.fieldText:
Lead's Information:

﻿

  • ﻿Lead Reference Number: {!getLeadRecord.LeadNumber__c}
  • Name: {!getLeadRecord.FirstName} {!getLeadRecord.LastName}
  • Broker Agency: {!getLeadRecord.BrokerAgency__r.Name}
  • Broker Agent: {!getLeadRecord.BrokerAgent__r.FirstName} {!getLeadRecord.BrokerAgent__r.LastName}
  • Sales Type: {!getLeadRecord.SalesType__c}
  • Property Usage: {!getLeadRecord.PropertyUsage__c}
  • Buy/Rent: {!getLeadRecord.BuyRent__c}
  • Property: {!getLeadRecord.Project__c}
  • Unit Type: {!getLeadRecord.UnitType__c}
  • Number Of Bedrooms: {!getLeadRecord.NumberOfBedrooms__c}
  • Offer: {!getLeadRecord.Offer1__c}
  • Purpose Of Use: {!getLeadRecord.PurposeOfUse__c}
  • Bulk: {!getLeadRecord.Bulk__c}
  • Property Readiness: {!getLeadRecord.PropertyReadiness__c}
  • Financing: {!getLeadRecord.Financing__c}
  • Customer Budget: {!getLeadRecord.CustomerBudget__c}

This lead matches an existing VIP Lead in the system. This cannot be converted.

Please reach out to your manager.
